results.title: Amlodipine and perindopril modulate miR-874-3p expression to regulate ferroptosis-linked LPCAT3/LACS4/GPX4 Axis and gut dysbiosis in metabolic-associated steatohepatitis.
results.text_hl: METHODS: Male Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into Sham (normal diet), @DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ (high-@CHEMICAL_Fats @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005223 @@@fat@@@, high-sugar diet), @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlo@@@ (@DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ + @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@), @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@Peri@@@ (@DISEASE_Fatty_Liver @DISEASE_MESH:D005234 @@@MASH@@@ + @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@), and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlo@@@+@CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@Peri@@@ (combination therapy) groups.

results.title: Identification of potentially effective drugs for metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease against liver cirrhosis: In-silico drug repositioning-based retrospective cohort study.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Atenolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (SHR: 0.81; 95% CI: 0.72-0.92; P < 0.001), @CHEMICAL_Isosorbide_Dinitrate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007548 @@@isosorbide dinitrate@@@ (SHR: 0.82; 95% CI: 0.73-0.93; P = 0.001), and valsartan (SHR: 0.52; 95% CI: 0.45-0.60; P < 0.001) were associated with a reduced risk of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@. Conversely, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-based combinations (SHR: 1.24; 95% CI: 1.11-1.39; P < 0.001), torasemide (SHR: 1.39; 95% CI: 1.24-1.56; P < 0.001), and valsartan-based combinations (SHR: 1.22; 95% CI: 1.09-1.37; P < 0.001) were linked to an increased risk.

citations.NLM: Lee CW, Kang ES, Jeong S, Han HW. Identification of potentially effective drugs for metabolic dysfunction-associated steatotic liver disease against liver cirrhosis: In-silico drug repositioning-based retrospective cohort study. PLoS One. 2025;20(6):e0323880. PMID: 40465795

results.title: The pharmacokinetic profile of amlodipine.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cirrhosis@@@, elimination half-life is significantly prolonged (60 vs 34 hours; p less than 0.01) suggesting that there is a greater accumulation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with severe @DISEASE_Liver_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008107 @@@liver disease@@@ than in individuals with normal hepatic function.

results.title: Amlodipine Ameliorates Ischemia-Induced Neovascularization in Diabetic Rats through Endothelial Progenitor Cell Mobilization
results.text_hl: On histological analysis, increased survival of @DISEASE_Myocardial_Stunning @DISEASE_MESH:D017682 @@@ischemic myocardium@@@ and decreased tissue @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ were observed in hearts of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Reduction of aldosterone production improves renal oxidative stress and fibrosis in diabetic rats.
results.text_hl: The authors hypothesized that reduction in @CHEMICAL_Aldosterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000450 @@@aldosterone@@@ production in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ or @CHEMICAL_aliskiren @CHEMICAL_MESH:C446481 @@@aliskiren@@@ improves @DISEASE_Diabetic_Nephropathies @DISEASE_MESH:D003928 @@@diabetic kidney disease@@@ by attenuating renal oxidative stress and @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Amlodipine decreases fibrosis and cardiac hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats: persistent effects after withdrawal.
results.text_hl: All three doses of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ reduced @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cardiac fibrosis@@@ and this regression persisted with the two highest doses after three months without treatment.

results.title: Enhancement of cardiac oxidative stress by tachycardia and its critical role in cardiac hypertrophy and fibrosis.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @CHEMICAL_azelnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C061679 @@@Azelnidipine@@@ suppressed @DISEASE_Cardiomegaly @DISEASE_MESH:D006332 @@@cardiac hypertrophy@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@, NADPH oxidase and @CHEMICAL_Superoxides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013481 @@@superoxide@@@ in spSHRs more potently than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, and was associated with lower heart rates than @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Effects of amlodipine on tubulointerstitial lesions in normotensive hyperoxaluric rats.
results.text_hl: In view of these data, we suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, probably by nonhemodynamic mechanisms of action, can provide an important benefit in the prevention of epithelial @DISEASE_Adenoma @DISEASE_MESH:D000236 @@@tubular cell injury@@@ and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ response and therefore in the prevention of the progressive @<m>DISEASE_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@tubulointerstitial fibrosis@@@ caused by @CHEMICAL_Oxalates @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010070 @@@oxalates@@@.
